column5: WATERFRONT DELIGHT! Enjoy the comfort of this inviting 1st floor 3 bedroom / 2 bath condo that boasts 2 balconies overlooking the Comal River. This condo is the perfect vacation getaway! Fully equipped with linens, towels, cooking utensils, washer/dryer, 2 Flat screen TV's, WIRELESS INTERNET, access to the river, pool, and spa.
column8: Spacious Waterfront Condo on the Comal River - Camp Warnecke - C105
